maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.cpp
/*

#include "beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

BeastInstance::~BeastInstance()
{
        if (!m_persistent) {
                // Remove it here or let it die with the scene
                BEAST_CALL(ILBDeleteInstance(m_obj));
        }
}

void BeastInstance::setPersistent( bool persistent )
{
        m_persistent = persistent;
}

void BeastInstance::setTransform( const ILBMatrix4x4& transform )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetInstanceTransform(m_obj, &transform));
}

void BeastInstance::setMotionTransforms(const std::vector<ILBMatrix4x4>& transforms)
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetInstanceMotionTransforms(m_obj, &transforms[0], (int32)transforms.size()));
}

void BeastInstance::setRenderStats( ILBRenderStatsMask stats, bool enable )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetRenderStats(m_obj, stats, enable?ILB_RSOP_ENABLE:ILB_RSOP_DISABLE));
}

void BeastInstance::setInstanceMesh(BeastMesh& mesh)
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetInstanceMesh(m_obj, mesh.obj()));
}

void BeastInstance::setMaterialOverride(BeastMaterialPtr material)
{
        ILBMaterialHandle materialOverride = material->obj();
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetMaterialOverrides(m_obj, &materialOverride, 1));
}

}
